abstract: HootSuite, which provides services to manage multiple social media accounts like Facebook and Twitter, said on Thursday that it has raised $165 million in new financing from a trio of investment firms.
snippet: HootSuite, which provides services to manage multiple social media accounts like Facebook and Twitter, said on Thursday that it has raised $165 million in new financing from a trio of investment firms.
lead_paragraph: HootSuite, which provides services to manage multiple social media accounts like Facebook and Twitter, said on Thursday that it had raised $165 million in new financing from a trio of investment firms.

headline.main: HootSuite Raises $165 Million in New Round of Financing

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
